BAD_REQUEST_TEXT: You are trying to access a page with wrong parameter.
NOT_FOUND_TEXT: The page you are looking for might have been removed had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
UNAUTHORIZED_TEXT: You tried to access a page you did not have prior authorization for.
SERVER_ERROR_TEXT: An error occured while trying to perform this action. Please Retry later.
SERVER_MAINTENANCE_TEXT:
Flop Ad is temporary unavailable for maintenance.
We expect to be back online $t(HOUR_NEXT, {'count': {{availableHoursLeft}}}).
We apologize for the inconvenience.
MAINTENANCE_PLANIFIED_TEXT:
Flop AD will be temporary unavailable due to scheduled maintenance in $t(HOUR, {'count': {{timeRemaining}}}).
We expect to be back online $t(HOUR_NEXT, {'count': {{ timeRemainingFromEnd }}}).
We apologize for the inconvenience.

GLOBAL_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry but an error occured. {{action}}. Please Try Later.
